definition: the act of making something harder (firmer or tighter or more compact)
details:
noun
- the act of making something harder (firmer or tighter or more compact)
- the process of becoming hard or solid by cooling or drying or crystallization
= example: the process of becoming hard or solid by cooling or drying or crystallization
= synonyms: set, solidifying, solidification, curing
- abnormal hardening or thickening of tissue
